text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with lobster mac and cheese that's
right i've never been a big fan of the

need changing is how chefs spend a lot

we were attempting to do here is take
our classic totally not broken mac and
cheese recipe and fix it up with lobster
and turn it into something a little more
fitting for a special occasion like for
example valentine's day so let's go
ahead get started and first up of course
you're gonna need some lobster and i'm

ounces each and by the way for the

live lobster and while i am a fan of

well actually it's not really a vein
